description:
Part A: Yumemi Ashi is haunted by a nightmare every day and one day, he meets Moguro, and opens up about his troubles. He then receives a special candy that lets him control dreams, but...
Part B: Taxi driver, Yowagoshi, is too meek to deal with rowdy customers and was troubled. He then meets Moguro, who gives him a certain item. What could this item be?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der von einem Alptraum Heimgesuchte / Das Schnurrbart-Taxi
The Man Chased by His Dreams / Mustache Taxi
Victime de ses rêves – Le taxi moustachu
Yume ni Owareru Otoko / Hige Taxi
夢に追われる男 / ひげタクシー
